Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harrison/St. Louis
ShortDescription: Eastbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Central Park, Jackson, Homan and Harrison, due to police activity near Harrison/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Central Park, Jackson, Homan, then resume their normal route on Harrison, due to police activity near Harrison/St. Louis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
